original_text: in the four corners of the court were small courts, forty cubits long and thirty broad; the four were of the same size.
korean_text: 뜰의 네 구석 안에는 집이 있으니 길이는 마흔 척이요 너비는 서른 척이라 구석의 네 뜰이 같은 크기며

sentences.original_text: in the four corners of the court were small courts
sentences.korean_translation: 뜰의 네 모퉁이에는 작은 뜰들이 있었으니

sentences.original_text: forty cubits long and thirty broad
the four were of the same size
